title: Lovely Townhome in San Dimas

show contact info
Welcome to this lovely Townhome located in the City of San Dimas.
This home is located in a quiet and quaint community.
Upon entering the home you are greeted into the bright and spacious living room that offers high ceilings, and recessed lighting.
From the living room you are greeted into the dining and kitchen area.
This allows for the open floor concept, and great entertaining.
As you enter into the remodeled kitchen you will find white kitchen cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and granite counter tops.
The kitchen offers direct entry into the 1 car garage and laundry room with a washer and dryer already installed.
In addition to the one car garage the property also comes with an assigned carport.
This home features 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.
The master bedroom offers a built in vanity, and walk in closest.
The community features a pool and clubhouse that is perfect for those warm summer days.
Conveniently located near schools, restaurants, shopping, and the 57 & 210 frwy.
Do not miss the opportunity to lease this beautiful townhome.
